title: Mbitr
author: Mbitr
content: Auction for a couple of little oddities/rarities1. CryptoKaiju PosterThis was collected at Coinfest 2018 Manchester 2. Cut Coin BTC This is a UK 10p piece from 2009 with a BTC design. Comes as a necklace/medallion I had 5 of these commissioned by a local coin cutter in 2018 . 3 of these are out in the wild, one kept by me and this one.Sorry piss poor photos - will get some better ones asap  As an extra you get limited edition Bond 10p as wellAUCTION TERMSBidding in BTC only Starting bid for each item 0.00BtcBidding format - 1. 0.0001                        2. 0.0001etc Min bid increments 0.0001BTCEnd Time - Thursday 26th May at 7pm GMTSniping - any bid made in the last 10 mins, will increase the auction time by 10 mins from that last bid , eg, if a  bid comes in at 6.57 , the New end time will be 7.07 and only for that particular item.Postage and shipping is to be paid by the buyer to be discussed on auction win I will reach out to the winner via pm with all relevant details . Careful of scammers. Check all links - I will only PM after the auction has ended and ONLY if you win. Escrow paid by the buyer .Thanks to all forum members whose auction templates I’ve borrowed/ stolen/ bastardised- too many to mention.

comments.body: Reserved for better photos  EDIT - couple of slightly better pics

comments.body: Thanks for your bids all  Highest bids -Lot 1 - 0.0002BTC minerjonesLot 2 - 0.0004BTC Mopar Better photos coming tomorrow

comments.body: Thanks for all the bids  Couple of slightly better images  - added to second post !

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Just under 24 hrs to go  Highest bids PeakDK Lot 1 - 0.0003BTCPeakDK Lot 2 - 0.0005BTC

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: As a lucky hodl'r of one of the 3 in the wild, I can attest that the 2009 10p cut coin BTC medallion is super cool!  Good luck everyone!

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: And …the winner is tweetious - I’ll be in touch via PM Winning bids Lot 1 - 0.0006BTCLot 2 - 0.0009BTCThanks for all the bids folks.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: All posted and on the way

comments.author: tweetious
comments.body: Quote from: Mbitr on May 27, 2022, 01:22:12 PMAll posted and on the way  Thank you!

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: tweetious on May 27, 2022, 10:50:57 PMThank you!  Lol, glad you got it, I actually have one of the others myself already. Great work mbitr, tbh I could not recall what the piece even was until this auction, as I don't recall winning it here -  but maybe it was an old slack xmas raffle or something!
